Trade/Device Name(s): Okmeter Match Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Okmeter Match Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Okmeter Match Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites to aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening or use on neonates
